verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3947>me,<s%> "Take a <S%H1419>large<s%> <S%H1549>tablet,<s%> and <S%H3789>write<s%> on it with a <S%H582>man<s%>'s <S%H2747>pen,<s%> <S%H4122><s%> 'For Maher Shalal Hash Baz;'

and I will <S%H5749>take<s%> for myself <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H5707>witnesses<s%> to <S%H5749>testify:<s%> <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3000>Jeberechiah.<s%>"

I <S%H7126>went<s%> to the <S%H5031>prophetess,<s%> and she <S%H2029>conceived,<s%> and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son.<s%> Then <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7121>me,<s%> "Call his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4122><s%> 'Maher Shalal Hash Baz.'

For before the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> how to <S%H7121>say,<s%> <S%H1><s%> 'My father,' <S%H517>and,<s%> 'My mother,' the <S%H2428>riches<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%> and the <S%H7998>spoil<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%> will be carried <S%H5375>away<s%> <S%H6440>by<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me yet <S%H3254>again,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3282>"Because<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H3988>refused<s%> the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H7975>Shiloah<s%> that <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H328>softly,<s%> and <S%H4885>rejoice<s%> in <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> and <S%H7425>Remaliah<s%>'s <S%H1121>son;<s%>

now <S%H136>therefore,<s%> behold, the Lord brings <S%H5927>upon<s%> them the <S%H6099>mighty<s%> <S%H7227>flood<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H5104>River:<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> and all his <S%H3519>glory.<s%> It will come <S%H5927>up<s%> over all its <S%H650>channels,<s%> and go <S%H1980>over<s%> all its <S%H1415>banks.<s%>

It will <S%H2498>sweep<s%> onward into <S%H3063>Judah.<s%> It will <S%H7857>overflow<s%> and pass <S%H5674>through;<s%> it will <S%H5060>reach<s%> even to the <S%H6677>neck;<s%> and the stretching <S%H4298>out<s%> of its <S%H3671>wings<s%> will <S%H4393>fill<s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of your <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H6005>Immanuel.<s%>

Make an <S%H7489>uproar,<s%> you <S%H5971>peoples,<s%> and be broken in <S%H2865>pieces!<s%> <S%H238>Listen,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you from <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>countries:<s%> <S%H247>dress<s%> for <S%H2865>battle,<s%> and be shattered! <S%H247>Dress<s%> for <S%H2865>battle,<s%> and be shattered!

<S%H5779>Take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> <S%H5779>together,<s%> and it will be brought to <S%H6565>nothing;<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> the <S%H1697>word,<s%> and it will not <S%H6965>stand:<s%> for God is with <S%H410>us.<s%>"

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> thus to me with a <S%H2393>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3256>instructed<s%> me not to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%> of this <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H559>"Don't<s%> say, <S%H7195><s%> 'A conspiracy!' concerning all about which this <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H7195><s%> 'A conspiracy!' neither <S%H3372>fear<s%> their <S%H4172>threats,<s%> nor be <S%H6206>terrorized.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is who you must <S%H6942>respect<s%> as <S%H4172>holy.<s%> He is the one you must fear. He is the one you must <S%H6206>dread.<s%>

He will be a <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> but <S%H68>for<s%> <S%H6697><s%> <S%H4383><s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> he will be a <S%H6341>trap<s%> and a <S%H4170>snare<s%> for the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
<S%H7227>Many<s%> will <S%H3782>stumble<s%> over <S%H5307>it,<s%> fall, be <S%H7665>broken,<s%> be <S%H3369>snared,<s%> and be <S%H3920>captured.<s%>"
Wrap <S%H6887>up<s%> the <S%H8584>testimony.<s%> <S%H2856>Seal<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> among my <S%H3928>disciples.<s%>
I will <S%H2442>wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> who <S%H5641>hides<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and I will look for <S%H6960>him.<s%>

<S%H3206>Behold,<s%> I and the children whom <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> me are for <S%H226>signs<s%> and for <S%H4159>wonders<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> who <S%H7931>dwells<s%> in <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

When they <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H1875>you,<s%> "Consult with those who have familiar <S%H178>spirits<s%> and with the <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> who <S%H6850>chirp<s%> and who <S%H1897>mutter:<s%>" <S%H5971>shouldn't<s%> a people <S%H1875>consult<s%> with their <S%H430>God?<s%> Should they consult the <S%H4191>dead<s%> on behalf of the <S%H2416>living?<s%>
Turn to the <S%H8451>law<s%> and to the <S%H8584>testimony!<s%> If they <S%H559>don't<s%> speak according to this <S%H1697>word,<s%> surely there is no morning for <S%H7837>them.<s%>

They will <S%H5674>pass<s%> through <S%H7185>it,<s%> very distressed and <S%H7457>hungry;<s%> and it will happen that when they are <S%H7456>hungry,<s%> they will <S%H7107>worry,<s%> and <S%H7043>curse<s%> by their <S%H4428>king<s%> and by their <S%H430>God.<s%> They will <S%H6437>turn<s%> their faces <S%H4605>upward,<s%>

and <S%H5027>look<s%> to the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and see <S%H6869>distress,<s%> <S%H2825>darkness,<s%> and the <S%H4588>gloom<s%> of <S%H6695>anguish.<s%> They will be <S%H5080>driven<s%> into thick <S%H653>darkness.<s%>
